definition: to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
bitter/hardship/pain/to suffer/to bring suffering to/painstakingly
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
lone/lonely
to go (to visit a superior)/one's current attainment in learning or art

sentences.english: In order to transform their environment, he drew up the project with painstaking efforts.
sentences.chinese: 为了改造环境，他苦心孤诣地制定了这个计划。

sentences.english: However, the civilians' common knowledge is not conceived by the deliberately-pretended low key.
sentences.chinese: 可惜，老百姓的常识没有被这种苦心孤诣的低调忽悠。

definition: to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned
painstaking effort/to take a lot of trouble/laborious at pains
lit. to spit out one's heart and spill blood (idiom)/to work one's heart out/blood, sweat and tears
to rack one's brains for schemes (idiom)/to beat one's brains out
to plot actively (idiom)/scheming/calculating
to build up an enterprise through painstaking efforts
to rack one's brains (idiom); to take great pains to think sth through
to concentrate fully on sth/single-minded
diligently
to take a lot of trouble (idiom); painstaking/at the cost of a lot of effort
to endure humiliation as part of an important mission (idiom); to suffer in silence
to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
to burn the midnight oil (idiom); to work continuously night and day
to waste (one's breath, one's energy etc)/to try in vain
focus/with complete devotion/stubbornly
diligent and tireless (idiom)
